resources.string: Sorry, can\'t log in with those credentials
The user connected to the username have too many active sessions. Please sign out of a few and try again.
Device limit reached. Please sign out of some device and try again.
Something was wrong with your credentials.
Could not find backend resource. Please make sure your app is updated.
The asset is not available in any format compatible with your application
The asset is not available for your particular device
You don\'t have the required permissions to watch this asset
The asset is not available in your region
The asset is not available for you
The asset is currently not available
